name: ChatRTX (NVIDIA)
description: [项目级] A developer reference project for creating Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbots on Windows using TensorRT-LLM。来源: https://github.com/NVIDIA/ChatRTX

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A developer reference project for creating Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbots on Windows using TensorRT-LLM

来源: https://github.com/NVIDIA/ChatRTX
语言: Python
Stars: 3111
